instructions: Tap a contact, then tap Edit. Do any of the following: Assign a photo to a contact: Tap add photo. You can take a photo or add one from the Photos app. Change a label: Tap the label, then select one in the list, or tap Add Custom Label to create one of your own. Add a birthday, social profile, related name, and more: Tap the Add button next to the item. Allow calls or texts from a contact to override Do Not Disturb: Tap Ringtone or Text Tone, then turn on Emergency Bypass. Add notes: Tap the Notes field. Add a prefix, phonetic name, pronunciation, and more: Tap add field, then select an item in the list. Delete contact information: Tap the Delete button next to a field. When you re finished, tap Done.
